committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acquire by exchange certain lands within the Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore in the State of Indiana.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire from the State of Indiana lands known as the Blue Heron Rookery at the Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore in exchange for lands known as the Hoosier Prairie at the Lakeshore. Prohibits such exchange unless Indiana: (1) transfers to the Secretary all right, title, and interest in the land offered for exchange; and (2) enters into a recordable agreement providing that the State will not use, or permit the use, of land it receives for other than the established use of the Lakeshore, will not transfer any right, title, or interest in, or control over such land to any person other than the Secretary, and will permit access to such land by the Secretary. Includes in such agreement a reversionary interest to the United States if the State fails to comply with certain provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acquire by exchange certain lands within the Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore in the State of Indiana.
